document.full_text: doctors have given rep. gabrielle giffords the go-ahead to travel to cape canaveral this week to watch husband mark kelly's space shuttle launch, mr. kelly said.
document.title: giffords cleared to attend shuttle launch
lines_and_colors: doctors have given rep. gabrielle giffords the go-ahead to travel to cape canaveral this week to watch husband mark kelly's space shuttle launch, mr. kelly said.
